title: Math
desc: The study of numbers, quantities, shapes, structures, and their relationships through abstract and logical reasoning. It provides a universal language for describing patterns and solving problems in various fields, from science and engineering, and everyday life.

questions.text: What is the value of 8+7?
If x =5, what is the value 3x+2?
What is the square root of 169?
What is the area of a triangle with a base of 10 units and height of 6 units?
What is the value of 13 + 1989 + 12?
What is the limit of the equation as x approaches zero, 1/x ?
What is the value of 2 x 27?

title: Physics
desc: The scientific study of matter, energy, and the fundamental forces that govern their interactions. It explores everything from the smallest particles, like atoms and quarks, to the vastness of galaxies and the universe.

questions.text: What is the acceleration due to gravity on Earth (approximately)?
Which of the following is an example of a vector quantity?
If a car has a constant speed of 20 m/s and travels for 4 seconds, how far does it go?
Which theory states that time slows down as an object approaches the speed of light?
Which of the following is a unit of force?

title: Marvel Superheroes
desc: Marvel superheroes are a diverse group of fictional characters created by Marvel Comics, known for their unique powers, rich backstories, and the complex, interconnected universe they inhabit.

questions.text: Which powerful book does Scarlet Witch acquire at the end of WandaVision?
Which of these characters is known as the 'Sorcerer Supreme'?
Who is known as the 'Merc with a Mouth'?
What does Tony Stark use to power his Iron Man suit?
Which Marvel superhero is also the King of Wakanda?
What is the name of Thor's hammer?
Which metal is Captain America's shield made from?
What is Spider-Man's real name?
What is the name of Scarlet Witch and Vision's twin sons in the comics?
What is Yelena Belova's relationship to Natasha Romanoff in the Marvel Cinematic Universe?

title: Taylor Swift
desc: Taylor Swift is a singer-songwriter known for her storytelling prowess, versatile musical style, and profound impact on pop and country music. Her early albums, like Taylor Swift and Fearless, solidified her as a country star. Swift then transitioned into pop with Red and 1989.

questions.text: What is Taylor Swift's birth year?
In which city did Taylor Swift start her music career?
Which album marked Taylor Swift's transition from country to pop?
Which Taylor Swift song features the lyrics You're on the phone with your girlfriend, she's upset?
Which song won Taylor Swift her first Grammy for Album of the Year?
What is Taylor Swift's fanbase called?
What was the first re-recorded album Taylor Swift released?
Taylor Swift's All Too Well (10 Minute Version) was released on which album?
Who is Taylor Swift's collaborator on the song Exile?
Taylor Swift was the first female solo artist to win which award three times?
questions.answer: Grammy for Album of the Year
answers: Grammy for Record of the Year
Grammy for Album of the Year
Grammy for Song of the Year

questions.text: Who directed the short film for All Too Well (10 Minute Version)?
Which music video did Taylor Swift co-direct with actor Blake Lively?
questions.answer: I Bet You Think About Me
answers: I Bet You Think About Me

questions.text: Taylor Swift broke which record with her album Midnights in 2022?
questions.answer: Most songs in the Billboard Hot 100 at once
answers: Most Grammy nominations in one year
Most songs in the Billboard Hot 100 at once
Longest time at No. 1 on the Billboard 200
Most weeks in the Billboard Top 10

title: Pokemon
desc: In the world of Pokémon, our everyday lives are filled with the companionship and wonder of incredible creatures known as Pokémon.

questions.text: Who is the first Pokémon in the National Pokédex?
Which Pokémon is known as the Evolution Pokémon?
Which of these Pokémon is a Water type?
Which Legendary Pokémon represents Time?
What type is Togepi?

Which Legendary Pokémon trio is known as the Legendary Beasts?
